        "897773d244604a8f8ebb33d220731209": {
          "id": "897773d244604a8f8ebb33d220731209",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Steps to solve 'unable to add attachment",
          "secure": false,
          "value": [
            {
              "value": [
                {
                  "type": "paragraph",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "text": "Cannot add attachments"
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  "type": "paragraph",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "text": "If you cannot add attachments or add images to your Outlook.com email, check these tips."
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  "type": "paragraph",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "text": ""
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  "type": "bulleted-list",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "If you reply to a message that has an attachment, the attachment wonâ€™t be included in the reply. If you need to keep original attachments, Forward the email instead."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "You can only attach files to calendar events that you or a delegate created."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "The size limit for an email in Outlook.com is 25 MB. This includes all text, inserted and attached files. Resizing an image doesn't reduce its file size. To reduce the size of an image or attachment, try compressing it or attach the file as a OneDrive link."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "Links to files from OneDrive do not count towards the email size limit, but the linked file size limit is 2GB."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "You can also use Copy link of a OneDrive attachment and paste it elsewhere."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "If you can add attachments or insert images, but the email won't send, read how to fix Outlook.com email sync issues."
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "mode": "simple",
              "_key": "ed8f21828517474d902284ac5b2abdac"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },

        "897773d244604a8f8ebb33d220731209": {
          "id": "897773d244604a8f8ebb33d220731209",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Steps to solve 'unable to add attachment",
          "secure": false,
          "value": [
            {
              "value": [
                {
                  "type": "paragraph",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "text": "Cannot add attachments"
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  "type": "paragraph",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "text": "If you cannot add attachments or add images to your Outlook.com email, check these tips."
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  "type": "paragraph",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "text": ""
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  "type": "bulleted-list",
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "If you reply to a message that has an attachment, the attachment wonâ€™t be included in the reply. If you need to keep original attachments, Forward the email instead."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "You can only attach files to calendar events that you or a delegate created."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "The size limit for an email in Outlook.com is 25 MB. This includes all text, inserted and attached files. Resizing an image doesn't reduce its file size. To reduce the size of an image or attachment, try compressing it or attach the file as a OneDrive link."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "Links to files from OneDrive do not count towards the email size limit, but the linked file size limit is 2GB."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "You can also use Copy link of a OneDrive attachment and paste it elsewhere."
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "type": "list-item",
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "text": "If you can add attachments or insert images, but the email won't send, read how to fix Outlook.com email sync issues."
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "mode": "simple",
              "_key": "ed8f21828517474d902284ac5b2abdac"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },

execute() {\n    var itsm_helper = new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper();\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"incident\");\n    gr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);\n\n    var title = gr.getElement(\"universal_request\").getLabel();\n    var eff_no = gr.getValue(\"task_effective_number\");\n    var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + vaVars.portal + '?sys_id=' + vaVars.inc_sysid + '&id=ticket&table=incident';\n    var table_name = gr.getClassDisplayValue();\n    var priority = gr.getDisplayValue('priority');\n    var short_description = gr.getValue('short_description');\n    var description = gr.getValue('description');\n    var state = gr.getDisplayValue('state');\n    var category = gr.getDisplayValue('category');\n    var assignment_group = gr.getDisplayValue('assignment_group');\n    var fields = [];\n    if (short_description != null && short_description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"short_description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": short_description });\n    if (state != null && state != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"state\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": state });\n    if (priority != null && priority != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"priority\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": priority });\n    if (category != null && category != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"category\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": category });\n    if (assignment_group != null && assignment_group != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"assignment_group\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": assignment_group });\n    if (description != null && description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": description });\n\n    var data = JSON.stringify({\n        \"title\": title,\n        \"fields\": fields,\n        \"subtitle\": eff_no,\n        \"url\": link\n\n    });\n    return vaSystem.renderCard(\"Card\", data);\n\n})()\n"},"secure":false},{"type":"ScriptedAction","type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {\n    vaSystem.attachRecordToConversation(\"incident\",         "6a7db4905a584afa9fb87e70c75962e6": {
          "id": "6a7db4905a584afa9fb87e70c75962e6",
          "name": "Create Request/Incident",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var caller = vaInputs.caller;\n    var short_desc = vaInputs.short_description;\n    var urgency = vaInputs.urgency;\n    var desc = vaInputs.description;\n    var cmdb_ci = vaInputs.cmdb_ci;\n\n     if (!gs.nil(caller) && !gs.nil(short_desc)) {\n        var incDetails = new sn_itsm_va.VACreateINCUtil().createIncident(caller, short_desc, urgency, desc, cmdb_ci);\n        vaVars.inc_sysid = incDetails.sysid;\n     }\n     \n})()",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "df272d0fd8c14fbab6088319b61192fd": {
          "id": "df272d0fd8c14fbab6088319b61192fd",
          "name": "Check UR created",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n  var incGr = new GlideRecord(\"incident\");\n  incGr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);\n  vaVars.is_UR_created = !gs.nil(incGr.universal_request);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "34d4f04483f245a6983cfde83b7a616b": {
          "id": "34d4f04483f245a6983cfde83b7a616b",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Decision"
        },
        "bf1525f6a270466aaa9c3308b3e68c01": {
          "id": "bf1525f6a270466aaa9c3308b3e68c01",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Request created",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    return gs.getMessageLang(\"Got it. I submitted your request and someone will be assigned to it soon.\", vaContext.getRequesterLang());\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "73225f98fb12484d941dc7608a8e39ff": {
          "id": "73225f98fb12484d941dc7608a8e39ff",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Display Request",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var itsm_helper = new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper();\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"incident\");\n    gr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);\n\n    var title = gr.getElement(\"universal_request\").getLabel();\n    var eff_no = gr.getValue(\"task_effective_number\");\n    var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + vaVars.portal + '?sys_id=' + vaVars.inc_sysid + '&id=ticket&table=incident';\n    var table_name = gr.getClassDisplayValue();\n    var priority = gr.getDisplayValue('priority');\n    var short_description = gr.getValue('short_description');\n    var description = gr.getValue('description');\n    var state = gr.getDisplayValue('state');\n    var category = gr.getDisplayValue('category');\n    var assignment_group = gr.getDisplayValue('assignment_group');\n    var fields = [];\n    if (short_description != null && short_description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"short_description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": short_description });\n    if (state != null && state != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"state\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": state });\n    if (priority != null && priority != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"priority\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": priority });\n    if (category != null && category != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"category\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": category });\n    if (assignment_group != null && assignment_group != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"assignment_group\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": assignment_group });\n    if (description != null && description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": description });\n\n    var data = JSON.stringify({\n        \"title\": title,\n        \"fields\": fields,\n        \"subtitle\": eff_no,\n        \"url\": link\n\n    });\n    return vaSystem.renderCard(\"Card\", data);\n\n})()\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "9b6dcac06c3748a79d55c202af689221": {
          "id": "9b6dcac06c3748a79d55c202af689221",
          "name": "Attach incident record to conversation",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    vaSystem.attachRecordToConversation(\"incident\", vaVars.inc_sysid);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        }

        "e4bf009677364e9fb70958b56e528946": {
          "id": "e4bf009677364e9fb70958b56e528946",

          "name": "Incident created",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    return gs.getMessageLang(\"OK, I've opened a new ticket for you, and someone will help you shortly.\", vaContext.getRequesterLang());\n})()\n",

            }

          },

        "6a7db4905a584afa9fb87e70c75962e6": {
          "id": "6a7db4905a584afa9fb87e70c75962e6",
          "name": "Create Request/Incident",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var caller = vaInputs.caller;\n    var short_desc = vaInputs.short_description;\n    var urgency = vaInputs.urgency;\n    var desc = vaInputs.description;\n    var cmdb_ci = vaInputs.cmdb_ci;\n\n     if (!gs.nil(caller) && !gs.nil(short_desc)) {\n        var incDetails = new sn_itsm_va.VACreateINCUtil().createIncident(caller, short_desc, urgency, desc, cmdb_ci);\n        vaVars.inc_sysid = incDetails.sysid;\n     }\n     \n})()",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "df272d0fd8c14fbab6088319b61192fd": {
          "id": "df272d0fd8c14fbab6088319b61192fd",
          "name": "Check UR created",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n  var incGr = new GlideRecord(\"incident\");\n  incGr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);\n  vaVars.is_UR_created = !gs.nil(incGr.universal_request);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "34d4f04483f245a6983cfde83b7a616b": {
          "id": "34d4f04483f245a6983cfde83b7a616b",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Decision"
        },
        "bf1525f6a270466aaa9c3308b3e68c01": {
          "id": "bf1525f6a270466aaa9c3308b3e68c01",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Request created",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    return gs.getMessageLang(\"Got it. I submitted your request and someone will be assigned to it soon.\", vaContext.getRequesterLang());\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "73225f98fb12484d941dc7608a8e39ff": {
          "id": "73225f98fb12484d941dc7608a8e39ff",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Display Request",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var itsm_helper = new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper();\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"incident\");\n    gr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);\n\n    var title = gr.getElement(\"universal_request\").getLabel();\n    var eff_no = gr.getValue(\"task_effective_number\");\n    var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + vaVars.portal + '?sys_id=' + vaVars.inc_sysid + '&id=ticket&table=incident';\n    var table_name = gr.getClassDisplayValue();\n    var priority = gr.getDisplayValue('priority');\n    var short_description = gr.getValue('short_description');\n    var description = gr.getValue('description');\n    var state = gr.getDisplayValue('state');\n    var category = gr.getDisplayValue('category');\n    var assignment_group = gr.getDisplayValue('assignment_group');\n    var fields = [];\n    if (short_description != null && short_description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"short_description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": short_description });\n    if (state != null && state != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"state\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": state });\n    if (priority != null && priority != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"priority\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": priority });\n    if (category != null && category != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"category\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": category });\n    if (assignment_group != null && assignment_group != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"assignment_group\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": assignment_group });\n    if (description != null && description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": description });\n\n    var data = JSON.stringify({\n        \"title\": title,\n        \"fields\": fields,\n        \"subtitle\": eff_no,\n        \"url\": link\n\n    });\n    return vaSystem.renderCard(\"Card\", data);\n\n})()\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "9b6dcac06c3748a79d55c202af689221": {
          "id": "9b6dcac06c3748a79d55c202af689221",
          "name": "Attach incident record to conversation",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    vaSystem.attachRecordToConversation(\"incident\", vaVars.inc_sysid);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_message_b26c788747a73910d570fa8bd36d437b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_message"><sys_ui_message action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><application>Virtual Agent</application><code/><commented_message/><key>va:topic:d4af90c747633910d570fa8bd36d43f8:node:897773d244604a8f8ebb33d220731209:field:0</key><language>en</language><message>Cannot add attachments If you cannot add attachments or add images to your Outlook.com email, check these tips.
- If you reply to a message that has an attachment, the attachment wonâ€™t be included in the reply. If you need to keep original attachments, Forward the email instead. - You can only attach files to calendar events that you or a delegate created. - The size limit for an email in Outlook.com is 25 MB. This includes all text, inserted and attached files. Resizing an image doesn't reduce its file size. To reduce the size of an image or attachment, try compressing it or attach the file as a OneDrive link. - Links to files from OneDrive do not count towards the email size limit, but the linked file size limit is 2GB. - You can also use Copy link of a OneDrive attachment and paste it elsewhere. - If you can add attachments or insert images, but the email won't send, read how to fix Outlook.com email sync issues.</message><sys_class_name>sys_ui_message</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-09 20:02:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>b26c788747a73910d570fa8bd36d437b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>va:topic:d4af90c747633910d570fa8bd36d43f8:node:897773d244604a8f8ebb33d220731209:field:0</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_message_b26c788747a73910d570fa8bd36d437b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-09 20:02:02</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_message></record_update>

        "6a7db4905a584afa9fb87e70c75962e6": {
          "id": "6a7db4905a584afa9fb87e70c75962e6",
          "name": "Create Request/Incident",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var caller = vaInputs.caller;\n    var short_desc = vaInputs.short_description;\n    var urgency = vaInputs.urgency;\n    var desc = vaInputs.description;\n    var cmdb_ci = vaInputs.cmdb_ci;\n\n     if (!gs.nil(caller) && !gs.nil(short_desc)) {\n        var incDetails = new sn_itsm_va.VACreateINCUtil().createIncident(caller, short_desc, urgency, desc, cmdb_ci);\n        vaVars.inc_sysid = incDetails.sysid;\n     }\n     \n})()",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "df272d0fd8c14fbab6088319b61192fd": {
          "id": "df272d0fd8c14fbab6088319b61192fd",
          "name": "Check UR created",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n  var incGr = new GlideRecord(\"incident\");\n  incGr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);\n  vaVars.is_UR_created = !gs.nil(incGr.universal_request);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "34d4f04483f245a6983cfde83b7a616b": {
          "id": "34d4f04483f245a6983cfde83b7a616b",
          "stepType": "Decision",

        },
        "bf1525f6a270466aaa9c3308b3e68c01": {
          "id": "bf1525f6a270466aaa9c3308b3e68c01",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Request created",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    return gs.getMessageLang(\"Got it. I submitted your request and someone will be assigned to it soon.\", vaContext.getRequesterLang());\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "73225f98fb12484d941dc7608a8e39ff": {
          "id": "73225f98fb12484d941dc7608a8e39ff",
          "stepType": "ScriptOutput",
          "name": "Display Request",
          "output_type": "single_part",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    var itsm_helper = new sn_itsm_va.ItsmVaHelper();\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"incident\");\n    gr.get(vaVars.inc_sysid);\n\n    var title = gr.getElement(\"universal_request\").getLabel();\n    var eff_no = gr.getValue(\"task_effective_number\");\n    var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + vaVars.portal + '?sys_id=' + vaVars.inc_sysid + '&id=ticket&table=incident';\n    var table_name = gr.getClassDisplayValue();\n    var priority = gr.getDisplayValue('priority');\n    var short_description = gr.getValue('short_description');\n    var description = gr.getValue('description');\n    var state = gr.getDisplayValue('state');\n    var category = gr.getDisplayValue('category');\n    var assignment_group = gr.getDisplayValue('assignment_group');\n    var fields = [];\n    if (short_description != null && short_description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"short_description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": short_description });\n    if (state != null && state != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"state\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": state });\n    if (priority != null && priority != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"priority\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": priority });\n    if (category != null && category != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"category\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": category });\n    if (assignment_group != null && assignment_group != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"assignment_group\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": assignment_group });\n    if (description != null && description != '')\n        fields.push({ \"fieldLabel\": gr.getElement(\"description\").getLabel(), \"fieldValue\": description });\n\n    var data = JSON.stringify({\n        \"title\": title,\n        \"fields\": fields,\n        \"subtitle\": eff_no,\n        \"url\": link\n\n    });\n    return vaSystem.renderCard(\"Card\", data);\n\n})()\n",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "9b6dcac06c3748a79d55c202af689221": {
          "id": "9b6dcac06c3748a79d55c202af689221",
          "name": "Attach incident record to conversation",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    vaSystem.attachRecordToConversation(\"incident\", vaVars.inc_sysid);\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        }
      },
